text: Ludia pouzivat je 1 obec when GOD sent prophets bearers z dobry zvest i mat rad warners. He sent them scripture bearing truth judge among the ludia ich disputes Ironically those kto received scripture je the jeden zamietnut any new scripture zretelny proofs dat them! This bol ziarlivsot ich part GOD guides those VERIT truth disputed all others v accordance s JEHO will GOD guides whoever wills straight CHODNICEK
